title: 14-days banned
body:
I hgave dyslexi. I can't write kys. Kys mens in Swedish head to head contakt
I write this 
Game 1
ImportantPlayer: kys
ImportantPlayer: k
ImportantPlayer: don't push and i will go top
ImportantPlayer: yea
ImportantPlayer: ok
ImportantPlayer: ty
ImportantPlayer: kys
ImportantPlayer: 2/4
ImportantPlayer: 27Â¤
ImportantPlayer: 2/4
ImportantPlayer: 2/4
ImportantPlayer: kys
ImportantPlayer: talon nice 3/10 please let me get rewards :C{{summoner:4}} {{summoner:4}} {{summoner:4}} {{champion:44}} {{item:3153}}

replies.body: KYS has a much different meaning, whether you were aware or not, it's still not allowed whatsoever in League. You can reach out to our player behavior agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you need to go more in-depth on why this isn't allowed.

> Kys mens in Swedish head to head contakt

I call bullshit:

* "kys" SV to EN:
https://translate.google.com/#sv/en/kys
* "head to head contact" EN to SV:
https://translate.google.com/#en/sv/head%20to%20head%20contact

Though Google translate is not 100% accurate, both of what you say have no translation (nor acronym) relating to "kys". You say it three times, especially after calling out someone's score. You then say at the end:

> ImportantPlayer: talon nice 3/10

I don't buy it.
if you cant trash talk or get mad about a bad player in a comp game than well over 1/2 of the LOL players should be banned this is over off one game and that is bs

The trash talking alone would not be escalated to a 14-day suspension, unless person already had a recent 25-game chat restriction. That is how the "Punishment Volcano" works. What *does* warrant an immediate 14-day suspension, or more, (regardless of past punishments) is the fact that this person was telling another to kill themselves. I was pointing out that 1) they said something that was inappropriate and 2) they tried to cover it up by lying about a different definition of the word.

Trash talk: go right ahead, but in moderation.
Tell someone to kill themselves: unacceptable in every situation.

fils bad dis is veri shit
{{champion:44}}
